entries.arrival_phase_2: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Target craft detected. Acquiring target. pcontrast3 >

entries.quest_escort_d: Defeat Ter-Doac's first wave of attackers before they can take the fight to Nova Orion forces.
entries.quest_location_d: Ter Doac Vaine's forces are heading to Ord Mantell space.
entries.quest_location_t: Ord Mantell System - Nova Orion Sector
entries.quest_target_d: Ter-Doac Vaine's control over Garrick Orion has been broken. He is now openly threatening Nova Orion Station. He must be stopped.
entries.split_quest_alert: Ter-Doac Vaine's fighters have engaged Nova Orion Station forces. We stand little chance without your help!
entries.title: Nova Orion: Ter-Doac Vaine's First Wave
entries.title_d: Ter-Doac Vaine has been behind all of the conflict between Jonas Nova and Garrick Orion. Using the Dark Side of the Force, Vaine was controlling Orion's emotions and pushing him to build battle droids and weapons so that Vaine could attempt to take control of the renegade Star Destroyer. Now that you know the truth, you must stop Ter-Doac Vaine.
